name: Vague notifications request

userMessages.content: When tasks are assigned to them, when deadlines are approaching, and when someone comments on their task. Email and in-app notifications.
Deadline reminders should be sent 24 hours before. Users should be able to turn off specific notification types. In-app notifications should appear in real time.
I think that's enough. Oh wait, there should also be a digest option where they get a daily summary instead of individual emails.

expectedOpenQuestions: Should notifications be sent for tasks in projects the user is watching but not assigned to?
What is the maximum acceptable delay for in-app notifications?
